ATAQuery: select {} from ATA_CHAPTER C left join ATA_CHAPTER_MTX_FLAG CF on CF.ATA_ID=C.ATA_ID left join ATA_SUB_CHAPTER S on S.ATA_ID=C.ATA_ID /*where C.ata_id in ('167CCD91-2081-11D4-B30E-0008C7E97D95','167CCD6C-2081-11D4-B30E-0008C7E97D95')*/order by c.ata_id, CF.id, s.sub_ata_id
ATAQuery2.1: select c.ata_id "atas.id:id", c.description "atas.name", CF.has_oil_svc_yn "atas.flags.has_oil_svc_yn:bool", CF.is_rii_item_yn "atas.flags.is_oil_svc_yn:bool", s.SUB_ATA_ID "atas.subata.id:id", S.DESCRIPTION "atas.subata.name" from ATA_CHAPTER C left join ATA_CHAPTER_MTX_FLAG CF on CF.ATA_ID=C.ATA_ID left join ATA_SUB_CHAPTER S on S.ATA_ID=C.ATA_ID order by c.ata_id, CF.id, s.sub_ata_id
ATAQuery2: select c.ata_id ".id:id", c.description ".name", CF.has_oil_svc_yn ".flags.has_oil_svc_yn:bool", CF.is_rii_item_yn ".flags.is_oil_svc_yn:bool", s.SUB_ATA_ID ".subata.id:id", S.DESCRIPTION ".subata.name" from ATA_CHAPTER C left join ATA_CHAPTER_MTX_FLAG CF on CF.ATA_ID=C.ATA_ID left join ATA_SUB_CHAPTER S on S.ATA_ID=C.ATA_ID order by c.ata_id, CF.id, s.sub_ata_id

StationQuery: select {} from station s left join stock_point p on p.station_id=s.id left join SHOP h on h.station_id=s.id /*where s.id in ('2','22') */ order by s.id, p.stock_point_id, h.shop_id
DepartmentQuery: select d.id, d.company_code, d.active_yn, d.department_name, d.DEPARTMENT_RIGHT_CODE, case when eg.code is not null then '['||eg.code||']'||et.code else null end event_group_code, rownum rn from department d left join event_template et on d.MERCURY_EVENT_CODE=et.ID left join event_group eg on eg.id=et.GROUP_ID where company_code='AE' order by d.ID
